justification: Package stability I=0.42 (Ce=5, Ca=7). Outgoing dependency org.jsoup has lower stability I=0.36 (Ce=4, Ca=7), violating Stable Dependencies Principle.

The package depends on org.jsoup.parser which is less stable. The instability (Ce/(Ca+Ce)) of org.jsoup.internal is 0.44 (4/(5+4)), while the instability of org.jsoup.parser is 0.50 (6/(6+6)). The dependent package has higher instability.

Ce:4, Ca:7, I=0.36; Dependencies: org.jsoup.safety (I=0.71), org.jsoup.nodes (I=0.42), org.jsoup.helper (I=0.42), org.jsoup.parser (I=0.50). All dependencies have higher instability values (I=Ce/(Ca+Ce)) than the analyzed package.

The analyzed package has instability I = 5/(5+7) = 0.417. It depends on packages with higher instability: org.jsoup.internal (I=0.444), org.jsoup.parser (I=0.5), and org.jsoup.select (I=0.555), violating the principle that dependencies should point in the direction of stability.

The analyzed package has instability I=1.0 (Ce=4, Ca=0). Its outgoing dependencies have lower instabilities: org.jsoup.select (I≈0.56), org.jsoup (I≈0.36), org.jsoup.nodes (I≈0.42), and org.jsoup.helper (I≈0.42). All dependencies are more stable than the analyzed package, so no Unstable Dependency is present.

The analyzed package has stability I = 5/(5+4) ≈ 0.556. Its outgoing dependencies have stabilities: org.jsoup.internal (0.444), org.jsoup (0.364), org.jsoup.nodes (0.417), org.jsoup.parser (0.5), org.jsoup.helper (0.417). All are less than or equal to the analyzed package's stability, so there is no unstable dependency.

The analyzed package has a stability (Ca/(Ca+Ce)) of 2/(2+5)=0.286. All outgoing dependencies have higher stability values: org.jsoup.internal (5/(5+4)=0.556), org.jsoup (7/(7+4)=0.636), org.jsoup.nodes (7/(7+5)=0.583), org.jsoup.parser (6/(6+6)=0.500), org.jsoup.helper (7/(7+5)=0.583). Therefore, no dependency is less stable than the analyzed package, satisfying the Stable Dependencies Principle.

The analyzed package has stability index (I) of 0.5 (Ce=6, Ca=6). All its outgoing dependencies have stability indices lower than or equal to 0.5: org.jsoup.internal (I=0.444), org.jsoup (I=0.364), org.jsoup.nodes (I=0.417), org.jsoup.safety (I=0.286), org.jsoup.select (I=0.444), org.jsoup.helper (I=0.417). Since the package does not depend on any component that is less stable (higher I value), no unstable dependency is detected.
